Articles.Content:
Maybe someone else has asked this before, but a quick question....

How did they enable animations in the VAB, and SPH?

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM 8thBMTS Sulaco

What do you mean exactly?

(Love your username XD)

If you are talking about what I think your talking about Then you want

Tweakable Everything since it allows you to do things such as deploy solar panels (and lots of other stuff)

Yep that's it. Could not figure it out. Thanki you Red Iron Crown, and Takai117.

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco.
